sentences.sContent: However, I do try to instill in them the ability to use sound engineering methods to analyze and design their programs and customize their practices.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, I do try to instill in them the ability to use sound engineering methods to analyze and design their programs and customize their practices.
sentences.sCn: 然而，我确实试图慢慢的向他们灌输使用适合的工程学方法来分析和设计程序、定制实践的能力。

remMethod.val: in(进入) + still(水滴) → 像水滴一样进入 → 滴注
